item.title: Flight Director Displays – F/O's or Both Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided approach minimums do not require their use.

numlitem.para: Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 1.
Modify ATC flight plan suffix to the appropriate code.

placard.para: Placard Near Mode Control Panel applicable Flight Director switch(es): "F/D ___ INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.
